attributes.action: Release all data re. conflicts of interest between Bill Gates and Govt Officials
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the COVID-19 vaccination trials and roll out are being rushed & pushed on an unprecedented scale in line with Bill Gates' long-awaited agenda's plans rather than for the wellbeing of the people of the UK.  I request that those in power in the UK Govt holding any interest or beneficial ownership financially or otherwise in any of Gate's entities must be released (inc. meeting minutes); ie. donations/investments to Imperial College, Matt Hancock, MOD Porton Down etc.
attributes.background: I request, as a matter of urgent public interest, the UK Government to release all information regarding any conflicts of interest between Bill Gates (including The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation/GAVI and any Gates-owned/related entity) and UK Government Ministers, Advisors and Officials.

rejection.details:
MPs, including Ministers, and officials are already required to declare any interests. You can find out more here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/registers-of-interests/register-of-members-financial-interests/

You might like to sign and share this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576

You can find out how to spot false information online here: https://sharechecklist.gov.uk/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
